Specimen Type(s): Surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Digital image viewing and management software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sectra Digital Pathology Module software for management and review of digital pathology images from scanned FFPE tissue slides.
Indications for Use Summary: Software for viewing and management of digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides from FFPE tissue as an aid to pathologist for primary diagnosis; not for use with frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens; intended for use with Aperio AT2 DX scanner and Dell MR2416 monitor.
